Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: jsoz002
Reviews.Content: Great device. Have it in my living room, the volume is good and loud enough to make Dolby sound, better than my old one.

Reviews.Title: sad surprise
Reviews.Author: Ricardo Cambraia
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV thinking about the great sound and good image but don't fool yourself because any other TV has a better sound than this without any additional speakers and the image is worse than my old Niko TV (imagine compare Sony and Niko).

Reviews.Title: sony lcd
Reviews.Author: RonaldRoss
Reviews.Content: this product is nothing but the best i love sony product and will keep buying there product i am very happy what i have and there deliver service was right on time the date that i was going to recived it

Instant 5.1 Theater
Sony's DIGITAL MEDIAL PORT
